transcript: were kept mefl iing and cleaning all night long without closing their eyes, while the adjutants and company commanders calculated and reckoned, and by morning the regiment instead of the strag- gling, disorderly crowd it had been on its last march the day before presented a well-or- dered array of two thousand men each of whom knew his place and his duty, had every button and every strap in place, and shone with clean- liness.
